title: Volcano Disaster and Regionally Grounded Science Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Earth Science and Local Environmental Issues Understanding
context.additional_context: Module-based learning centered on the regional volcanic history of Kelut Mountain and traditional knowledge.

learning_goals: Develop the ability to scientifically analyze community vulnerability during volcanic disasters
Formulate volcanic disaster response strategies by integrating local wisdom and modern science
Apply knowledge of volcanic material properties and risk management through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
